name: Hammou Brahimouaissa
message: Your presence, contribution, and determination have been highly appreciated in TiniTec, wishing you continued success in your next adventures, stay committed

name: Moussa Bayou
message: You've been a highly proactive member of our team. I cannot recall the many things I've adopted from you, and the many times we've collaborated on projects that ended up a success. Great pleasure to have worked with you, and I wish you the best with your career!

name: Ilyes Mekbal
message: Chafik was a great colleague, he was always helpful to me and to the rest of the team, always recommends the best tools to build a project, always focused on the best practices. I would always recommend him as part of the team
